column4: Anyone have experience with Wine(the emulator)? How do I increase the hard drive size?
drive_c is just a folder under /home, so it should have as much as your home dir
which version of PS?  I don't they they play well with wine
This looks complicated, but it's the best I could find: http://bugs.winehq.org/show_bug.cgi?id=10018#c16
